railtrails
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

Rail-trail trail data

Information and reviews for rail-trails in the United States

railtrails

Format

Data frame with columns

name

Name of rail trail

distance

distance (miles)

surface

surface material

category

trail category

mean_review

mean review rating

description

text description of trail

n_reviews

number of reviews

raw_reviews

list column with a vector of reviews

Source

https://www.traillink.com/

Examples

railtrails
#> # A tibble: 3,846 x 11
#>    state name   distance surface category mean_review description     n_reviews
#>    <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>   <chr>          <int> <chr>           <chr>    
#>  1 AK    Chase…    14.0  Dirt, … Rail-Tr…           4 "\r\n         … 1 Reviews
#>  2 AK    Tony …    11.0  Asphalt Rail-Tr…           5 "The Tony Know… 5 Reviews
#>  3 AK    Bird …    13.0  Asphalt Rail-Tr…           5 "\r\n         … 3 Reviews
#>  4 AK    Campb…     7.50 Asphal… Greenwa…           5 "\r\n         … 3 Reviews
#>  5 AK    Goose…     1.50 Asphal… Greenwa…           0 "\r\n         … 0 Reviews
#>  6 AK    Homer…     4.00 Asphalt Greenwa…           5 "On the southe… 1 Reviews
#>  7 AK    Lanie…     3.90 Asphal… Greenwa…           3 "The Lanie Fle… 1 Reviews
#>  8 AK    Palme…     6.10 Gravel  Rail-Tr…           0 "As its name s… 0 Reviews
#>  9 AK    Ship …     2.60 Asphalt Rail-Tr…           4 " \r\nShip Cre… 1 Reviews
#> 10 AL    Chief…    33.0  Asphalt Rail-Tr…           5 "In northeast … 77 Revie…
#> # ... with 3,836 more rows, and 3 more variables: raw_reviews <list>,
#> #   lat <dbl>, lng <dbl>

# to expand vector of review ratings in raw_reviews column:
library(tidyr)
railtrails <- railtrails %>% unnest(raw_reviews)
